CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 3, 1945, pg. 24, reads: "Kay Club Forum - Members of the Herron Hill Junior High School who participated in a recent Youth Forum at the Kay Boys' Club, were Sara Ann Trower, Shirley Lightfoot, Ruth Phelps, Derrick Bell, William Green, Robert L. Hughes and Donald Stockes. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Herron Hill Junior High School students Sara Ann Trower, Shirley Lightfoot, Ruth Phelps, Derrick Bell, William Green, Robert L. Hughes, and Donald Stockes posed in Harris Studio
